text.text_translated:
The sharing economy is a business idea. People can make money from things they own but do not always use. Businesses know this is a good way to make money.

A new business model is now very popular. Companies create an online platform. This is a website or an app. The platform works between two groups of people. It connects people who offer a product or a service with people who want to use them.

For example, Airbnb is a company like this. It connects people with empty rooms to people who need a place to stay. The owners can make a lot of money from their unused rooms.

Uber is another example. It helps people to use their own cars like taxis. They can make extra money when they have free time.

best_attempt.text_translated:
The sharing economy is a business idea. People can make money from things they own but do not always use. Businesses know this is a good way to make money.

A new business model is now very popular. Companies create an online platform. This is a website or an app. The platform acts as a middleman. It connects people who have something with people who want to use it.

For example, Airbnb is a company like this. It connects people with empty rooms to people who need a place to stay. The owners can make a lot of money from their unused rooms.

Uber is another example. It encourages people to use their own cars like taxis. They can make extra money when they have free time.
